name: Last Stand (MetalCat)
description:
Last Stand is a simple game where you need to survive increasing waves of zombies

In the end of each wave your ammo is restocked,you can pick up objects like explosive barrels and place mine  to create traps

Have fun!

ALL SOUNDS AND MODELS USED IN GAME ARE MADE BY VAVLE FOR HALF LIFE 2(http://www.valvesoftware.com/)_
